About the Company: Kavveri Telecom Products Limited (Kavveri) is a telecom wireless subsystem products manufacturer, providing hardware products and solutions for the Telecom, Defence and Aerospace segments. The Company designs, develops, tests and manufactures a range of Wireless Telecom products. The Company provide a range of products, such as Antennas, RF Components, Cables & Connectors, Repeaters,TMA/TMB and energy conserving Solar Products. In July 2012, the Company incorporated a wholly owned subsidiary known as Kavveri Technologies Asia Pte. Ltd. In July 2012, Kavveri Technologies Americas Inc, which is its wholly owned subsidiary, acquired wireless division of WPCS International Incorporated, with operating business units located in Hartford, Connecticut and Hartford, New Jersey.
